id.description: Unique identifier for the metadata entry.

fromDate.description: Start date for the reported performance data.

toDate.description: End date for the reported performance data.

metrics.description: Various performance metrics for the promoted links.

impressions.description: Number of times the promoted links were displayed.

clicks.description: Number of clicks on the promoted links.

totalConversions.description: Total number of conversions from all promoted links.

conversions.description: Number of conversions from the promoted links.

viewConversions.description: Number of conversions from view interactions.

spend.description: Total amount spent on promoting the links.

ecpc.description: Effective Cost Per Click - the average cost per click.

ctr.description: Click-Through Rate - the percentage of clicks out of impressions.

conversionRate.description: Rate at which clicks resulted in conversions.

viewConversionRate.description: Rate at which view interactions resulted in conversions.

cpa.description: Cost Per Acquisition - the cost per conversion.

totalCpa.description: Total Cost Per Acquisition across all promoted links.

totalSumValue.description: Total value generated by all conversions from all promoted links.

sumValue.description: Total value generated by all conversions.

viewSumValue.description: Total value generated by all view conversions.

totalAverageValue.description: Total average value generated by all conversions.

averageValue.description: Average value generated by the promoted links.

viewAverageValue.description: Average value generated by view conversions.

totalRoas.description: Total Return on Advertising Spend across all promoted links.

roas.description: Return on Advertising Spend - the revenue generated for each dollar spent.

videoReachedFirstQ.description: Number of times viewers reached the first quartile of a video.

videoReachedSecondQ.description: Number of times viewers reached the second quartile of a video.

videoReachedThirdQ.description: Number of times viewers reached the third quartile of a video.

videoReachedCompletion.description: Number of times viewers reached the completion of a video.

videoPlays.description: Number of times videos in the promoted links were played.

marketer_id.description: Unique identifier for the marketer associated with the performance data.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign associated with the performance data.

promoted_link_id.description: Unique identifier for the promoted link associated with the performance data.
